entry.title: 0xsplits â€“ Power Is Nothing Without Control
entry.summary: 0xSplits is an open-source, audited, and non-upgradeable protocol for efficiently splitting onchain income. Whenever a Split receives funds, each recipient gets their share. Simple enough for friends, secure enough for anons.
